subject: Football
lead_paragraph: As a five-time winner of the N.F.L. executive of the year award, Colts President Bill Polian is one of the few New Yorkers to make a name as an assessor of pro football talent.
snippet: As a five-time winner of the N.F.L. executive of the year award, Colts President Bill Polian is one of the few New Yorkers to make a name as an assessor of pro football talent.
